activity_differential: cats grooming and playing with toys
cats exploring and interacting with environment
cats taking turns on table and approaching camera
description: A white cat is initially on a table, grooming and interacting with a toy. Later, a gray cat appears, climbs onto the table, and approaches the camera. The cats are engaged in self-grooming, play, and exploration in a living room environment.
